entry.title: Encrypt Your Sensitive Information Before Storing It - Encrypting with Mozilla SOPS and AGE

link.title: Encrypt Your Sensitive Information Before Storing It - Encrypting with Mozilla SOPS and AGE

entry.summary: Committing secrets to your Git Repo can expose information like passwords, access tokens, and other types of sensitive information. Some might think that committing secrets to a private Git Repo is OK, but I am here to tell you it‚Äôs not. If you‚Äôre going to commit secrets to a git repo, private or public, you should encrypt them first using Mozilla SOPS (Secret Operations) and AGE. SOPS is ...
